title: Mean Center — mean_center
code: df <- data.frame(   lon = c(20, 50, 30, 80, 10),   lat = c(25, 70, 30, 50, 30),   grp = c("a", "b", "a", "b", "a"),   wt = c(1,5,1,3,2)) x <- sf::st_as_sf(df, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326) mean_center(x, group = "grp", weight = "wt") #> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 1 field #> Geometry type: POINT #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 17.51482 ymin: 29.00224 xmax: 65.92087 ymax: 63.32603 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #>   grp                  geometry #> 1   a POINT (17.51482 29.00224) #> 2   b POINT (65.92087 63.32603)

title: Median Center — median_center

code: df <- data.frame(   lon = c(-88, -90, -92, -89, -90),   lat = c(42, 40, 30, 32, 42),   grp = c("a", "b", "a", "b", "a"),   wt = c(1,1,1,1,1))  x_sf <- sf::st_as_sf(x, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x' not found x_transformed <- sf::st_transform(x, crs = "ESRI:102003") #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x' not found median_center(x_transformed, group = "grp", weight = "wt") #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x_transformed' not found
